---
title: Web App
---

The native Chainlit UI that is available on port 8000. Should open in your default browser when you run `chainlit run`.

## Supported Features

| Message | Streaming | Elements | Audio | Ask User | Chat History | Chat Profiles | Feedback |
| ------- | --------- | -------- | ----- | -------- | ------------ | ------------- | -------- |
| ✅      | ✅        | ✅       | ✅    | ✅       | ✅           | ✅            | ✅       |

</Frame>
